Title: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption
Description: Denial of Service attack through XML payloads

NotImpacted: All versions before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.0.99 before 2.1.0, all versions starting from 2.1.99 before 2.2.0, all versions starting from 2.2.99 before 2.3.0, all versions starting from 2.3.99 before 2.4.0, all versions starting from 2.4.99 before 2.5.0, all versions starting from 2.5.90 before 2.6.0, all versions starting from 2.6.6, all versions before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.0.6
